name: alpine stitch ear warmer
notes:
make a fun and quick ear warmer! easy to work in simple stitches.

full and complete instructions to make this fun ear warmer!

> please note that this pattern is
> available for free on my blog [here][1].
> the benefit of purchasing this pdf is
> an easy to read, printable, and
> ad-free version of the pattern.

approximate finished size is 20” around and 3.75” wide. sized to fit an adult

materials needed:

bulky weight #5 yarn 
crochet hook size k 10.5/6.5 mm 
tapestry needle 
pattern is written in english, using standard american terms

level: beginner/advanced beginner.

for more information, see: 
due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase.


  [1]: https://www.crochet365knittoo.com/alpine-crochet-headband/
